00013 template<class GV>
00014 void ipbs_P1(const GV& gv, const std::vector<int>& elementIndexToEntity,
00015              const std::vector<int>& boundaryIndexToEntity)
00016 {
00017   // We want to know the total calulation time
00018   // Dune::Timer timer;
00019 
00020   // some typedef
00021   const int dim = GV::dimension;
00022   typedef typename GV::Grid::ctype ctype;
00023 
00024   // <<<1>>> Setup the problem from mesh file
00025 
00026   // NOTE only flux b.c. are iterated, so rest is instantiated only once
00027   // inner region
00028   typedef Regions<GV,double,std::vector<int>> M;
00029   M m(gv, elementIndexToEntity);
00030   // boundary conditioon type
00031   typedef BCType<GV,std::vector<int>> B;
00032   B b(gv, boundaryIndexToEntity);
00033   // Class defining Dirichlet B.C.
00034   typedef BCExtension<GV,double,std::vector<int>> G;
00035   G g(gv, boundaryIndexToEntity);
00036 
00037   // Create finite element map
00038   typedef Dune::PDELab::P1LocalFiniteElementMap<ctype,Real,dim> FEM;
00039   FEM fem;
00040 
00041   // <<<2>>> Make grid function space
00042   typedef Dune::PDELab::OverlappingConformingDirichletConstraints CON;
00043   CON con;
00044   // Define ISTL Vector backend - template argument is the blocksize!
00045   typedef Dune::PDELab::ISTLVectorBackend<1> VBE;
00046   typedef Dune::PDELab::GridFunctionSpace<GV,FEM,CON,VBE> GFS;
00047   GFS gfs(gv,fem,con);
00048 
00049   // Create coefficient vector (with zero values)
00050   typedef typename GFS::template VectorContainer<Real>::Type U;
00051   U u(gfs,0.0);
00052   
00053   // <<<3>>> Make FE function extending Dirichlet boundary conditions
00054   typedef typename GFS::template ConstraintsContainer<Real>::Type CC;
00055   CC cc;
00056   Dune::PDELab::constraints(b,gfs,cc); 
00057   // if (helper.rank==0)
00058   //   std::cout << "constrained dofs=" << cc.size() 
00059   //             << " of " << gfs.globalSize() << std::endl;
00060 
00061   // interpolate coefficient vector
00062   // this has to be done only during intitialization as we don't change dirichlet b.c.
00063   Dune::PDELab::interpolate(g,gfs,u);
00064 
00065   // Provide a mapper for storing precomputed values
00066   typedef Dune::MultipleCodimMultipleGeomTypeMapper<GV, P0Layout> Mapper;
00067   Mapper mapper(gv);
00068   // allocate a vector for the data
00069   std::vector<double> fluxContainer(mapper.size());
00070 
00071   // --- here the iterative loop starts! ---
00072   
00073   while (sysParams.get_error() > 1E-3 && sysParams.counter < 11)
00074   // while (sysParams.counter < 3)
00075   {       
00076     // construct a discrete grid function for access to solution
00077     typedef Dune::PDELab::DiscreteGridFunction<GFS,U> DGF;
00078     const DGF udgf(gfs, u);
00079 
00080     // call the function precomputing the boundary flux values
00081     ipbs_boundary(gv,udgf, mapper, fluxContainer);
00082 
00083     // boundary fluxes - this one is for the reference solution!
00084     typedef BoundaryFlux<GV,double,std::vector<int> > J;
00085     J j(gv, boundaryIndexToEntity);
00086 
00087     // <<<4>>> Make Grid Operator Space
00088     typedef PBLocalOperator<M,B,J> LOP;
00089     LOP lop(m,b,j, fluxContainer);
00090     typedef Dune::PDELab::ISTLBCRSMatrixBackend<1,1> MBE;
00091     typedef Dune::PDELab::GridOperatorSpace<GFS,GFS,LOP,CC,CC,MBE,true> GOS;
00092     GOS gos(gfs,cc,gfs,cc,lop);
00093 
00094     // <<<5a>>> Select a linear solver backend
00095     typedef Dune::PDELab::ISTLBackend_BCGS_AMG_SSOR<GFS> LS;
00096     LS ls(gfs);
00097 
00098     // <<<5b>>> Solve nonlinear problem
00099     typedef Dune::PDELab::Newton<GOS,LS,U> NEWTON;
00100     NEWTON newton(gos,u,ls);
00101     newton.setLineSearchStrategy(newton.hackbuschReuskenAcceptBest);
00102     newton.setReassembleThreshold(0.0);
00103     newton.setVerbosityLevel(0);
00104     newton.setReduction(1e-10);
00105     newton.setMinLinearReduction(1e-4);
00106     newton.setMaxIterations(25);
00107     newton.setLineSearchMaxIterations(10);
00108     newton.apply();
00109 
00110     // save snapshots of each iteration step
00111     std::stringstream out;
00112     out << "step_" << sysParams.counter;
00113     std::string filename = out.str();
00114     DGF udgf_snapshot(gfs,u);
00115     Dune::VTKWriter<GV> vtkwriter(gv,Dune::VTKOptions::conforming);
00116     vtkwriter.addVertexData(new Dune::PDELab::VTKGridFunctionAdapter<DGF>(udgf_snapshot,"solution"));
00117     vtkwriter.write(filename,Dune::VTK::appendedraw);
00118     // Gnuplot output
00119     Dune::GnuplotWriter<GV> gnuplotwriter(gv);
00120     gnuplotwriter.addVertexData(u,"solution");
00121     gnuplotwriter.write(filename + ".dat"); 
00122   }
00123 
00124   // --- here the iterative loop ends! ---
00125 
00126   // <<<6>>> graphical output
00127   typedef Dune::PDELab::DiscreteGridFunction<GFS,U> DGF;
00128   DGF udgf(gfs,u);
00129   Dune::VTKWriter<GV> vtkwriter(gv,Dune::VTKOptions::conforming);
00130   vtkwriter.addVertexData(new Dune::PDELab::VTKGridFunctionAdapter<DGF>(udgf,"solution"));
00131   vtkwriter.write("ipbs_solution",Dune::VTK::appendedraw);
00132 
00133   // Gnuplot output
00134   Dune::GnuplotWriter<GV> gnuplotwriter(gv);
00135   gnuplotwriter.addVertexData(u,"solution");
00136   gnuplotwriter.write("ipbs_solution.dat"); 
00137   
00138   // std::cout << "Reference total calculation time=" << timer.elapsed() << std::endl;
00139 }
